articles.title: Revealed: Europe's 20 biggest meat and dairy firms' pollution - EUobserver
articles.description: Europe's 20 biggest meat and dairy corporations emit more greenhouse gas than the Netherlands or Denmark, new research reveals - ahead of the European Commission's presentation of its carbon farming initiative.

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness.
